spring.000: Pfft. Alex is no ladies man compared to me. Steve The Hair Harrington.
marriage.000: Hey there, handsome. You taking a break from work?^Hey there, gorgeous. You taking a break from work?#$b#Or did you want to come and see me?$1
summer.000: Hey, I can hook ya up with some ice cream later? Alex owns the stand, but we both know I'm better at working it.
winter.000: Oh hey! You come here too? Nice.
